CustomField.description: Cost of gas from the index. For NYMEX, this is the collateral and exchange fee. For trading points, it's the cost of delivery from the point to the pool.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Cost of gas from the index. For NYMEX, this is the collateral and exchange fee. For trading points, it's the cost of delivery from the point to the pool.
CustomField.label: Index cost
